overview: You don't always need to head to Germany for some hot sex, but that's where we're headed for these four Frankfurt Sex Stories - and it gets even better because it's all bareback. The men's washroom isn't the best place for a threeway tryst, but it's their own private tease chamber as three stud muffins start this unlikely love-in with a dick munching triangle and end it with a bare backing spunkfest. Meanwhile, the cabin in the woods is the rugged holiday home for a couple of buff lovers who romp to their heart's content with no interruptions. From top to bottom, watch as these Ass Invaders get a full body workout.
title: Ass Invaders
